type: Services of a Contractor to install police identity marking decals on police vehicles
short_summary: The RCMP requires the services of a Contractor to install police identity marking decals on approximately 250-300 vehicles per year.
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the services of a Contractor to install police identity marking decals on approximately 250-300 vehicles per year. The services will be required on multiple vehicle platforms on an 'as and when' requested basis at the Contractor's location. LocationThe Contractor must pick up the vehicle requiring decaling at the Delivery Point (1150-5450 Korea Rd Chilliwack,BC) and return it to the same location upon completion of the work.There are security requirements associated with this requirement, details of which can be found in the request for proposal documents, Phase 2....
tags: *Motor Vehicle Maintenance and Repair Shop Specialized Equipment - Repair
